name: 3M 244 Masking Tape, gold, 30 mm x 50 m (sealed)
description: The Scotch Super painter's masking tape 244 is the golden all-rounder for almost all outdoor and indoor jobs. “The Original” is considered by many painters to be probably the best masking tape in the world. The impregnated, thin paper material provides razor-sharp paint edges on smooth or slightly textured substrates and prevents bleeding or seepage of paint, saving rework.

name: 3M 244 Masking Tape - gold 30mm x 50m
description: Scotch masking tape 244 is a gold-coloured specialty masking tape with a thin paper carrier and synthetic adhesive. It is suitable for holding, bundling, sealing and masking, especially when exposure to sunlight is expected. Ideal for professional masking tasks indoors and outdoors.

name: 3M 244 Masking Tape - gold 36mm x 50m
description: Scotch masking tape 244 is a gold-coloured special masking tape with a thin paper carrier and synthetic adhesive. It is suitable for holding, bundling, sealing and masking, especially when exposure to sunlight is expected. Ideal for professional masking work indoors and outdoors.

name: 3M 244 Masking Tape Gold 24mm x 50m - Sealed
description: Professional painter's masking tape that adheres reliably to almost all interior and exterior surfaces. Provides crisp paint edges and is suitable for all paint types. Removable without residue for up to 150 days. UV-resistant and water-repellent impregnated. Designed for industrial and professional use.

name: 3M 361 Glass Cloth Tape, White, 19 mm x 55 m x 0.17 mm
description: The 3M 361 glass cloth adhesive tape is suitable for applications requiring high temperature resistance. It features a pressure-sensitive silicone adhesive providing strong adhesion, durability, good holding power and residue-free removal. The abrasion-resistant tape is suitable for sealing high-temperature lines and chambers, masking during plasma spraying and other applications requiring high tear strength and temperature resistance.

name: 3M 389 Cloth Tape, 100 mm x 50 m, red
description: The 3M 389 cloth adhesive tape is a universally applicable tape with very good adhesion to a wide range of substrates. It features good tear resistance and flexibility for use on uneven surfaces. The tape is polyethylene-coated, easy to handle and can be used in conjunction with moisture. Its woven structure allows light masking on curves. It offers very high long-term holding power and good conformability. Typical uses include color-coding components, general repairs or bundling pipes and fabrics. (Note: product listing title shows red; generic description on site mentions silver.)

name: 3M 499 PVC plaster tape, yellow, 50 mm x 33 m
description: The Scotch Plaster Tape 499 is ideal for protecting smooth and uneven surfaces during plastering, rendering and facade renovation. It is also useful as formwork joint tape before concreting, or for splicing and masking films. Thanks to its very good tack it can be used for packing, reinforcing or fixing. For sensitive surfaces we recommend double taping in combination with Scotch Super Painter's Tape 244 and Scotch Plaster Tape 499 over it.

name: 3M 5421 UHMW polyethylene low-friction adhesive tape 19mm x 16.5m, 0.17mm, rubber/resin
description: 3M UHMW (ultra-high-molecular-weight) polyethylene low-friction adhesive tapes have a very low coefficient of friction and high abrasion resistance. They provide a highly slip-resistant surface, are self-lubricating, resistant to moisture and many chemicals, repel most dry or pasty substances, and have good puncture and impact resistance. Available in different thicknesses and adhesive types; particularly suitable as slide/guide tape and for die-cut parts.

name: 3M 5490 PTFE Extruded Film Adhesive Tape 25mm x 33m, 0.09mm, Silicone
description: 3M 5490 and 5491 are extruded Teflon (PTFE) film adhesive tapes with a high-temperature resistant silicone adhesive; they mainly differ in thickness. They offer excellent chemical resistance, a low coefficient of friction and good non-stick properties. The extruded Teflon film provides an extremely smooth surface and the tapes do not curl when unwound.

name: 3M 5421 UHMW Polyethylene Sliding Adhesive Tape 25 mm x 16.5 m, 0.17 mm, Rubber/Resin

These properties make them especially suitable as sliding tapes. The tapes are self-lubricating, resistant to moisture and many chemicals, repel most dry or pasty substances, and offer good puncture and impact resistance. Available in different thicknesses and adhesive types (rubber/resin).

name: 3M ATG Adhesive Film 928, White, 19 mm x 16.5 m, 0.05 mm
description: The white double-sided adhesive tape with paper fleece carrier 3M 928 features a repositionable adhesive on one side (Post-it note effect) and a permanent adhesive on the other. Thin and light materials such as paper, films and cardboard can be removed without damage and reused. The tape is 0.05 mm thick and temperature resistant up to +65 °C. It can be processed easily and economically with ATG hand dispensers.
_check: Country code inferred as 'de' though URL is .com; price choice (13.72) assumed per roll/unit.

name: 3M All-purpose PVC Tape 764, Yellow, 50 mm x 33 m (individually packaged)
description: PVC adhesive tapes offer a wide range of applications due to their solvent resistance, color quality, extensibility and abrasion resistance. Features include very stretchable carrier material, easy processing even on uneven surfaces, high initial tack and availability in many colors. Intended for industrial and professional use.

name: 3M Lead Adhesive Tape 420, Silver, 19 mm x 33 m, 0.19 mm
description: Adhesive tape for masking during chrome plating to protect against blooming, for radiation shielding and for marking in radiography. Features: electrically conductive, chemically resistant adhesive, good weather resistance, highly formable, easy to die-cut, wound on protective liner. Intended for industrial/professional use.

name: 3M Double-sided Tape with Polyester Carrier 93010LE, Transparent, 25 mm x 55 m, 0.1 mm
categoryEnglishName: Thin double-sided tapes with film carrier
subCategoryEnglishNames: Thin double-sided tapes with film carrier
description: The carrier film of this tape gives foams and other materials increased dimensional stability and facilitates handling when cutting and stamping. The 3M 300LSE adhesive provides very high initial tack and the adhesive strength further increases with time and temperature. The 93010LE is a 100 µm thick, high-tack acrylic adhesive (3M 300LSE series) on a 107 µm PE-coated release liner. Suitable for low-energy surfaces such as PE or PP, powder-coated or slightly oily substrates, decorative trims and assembly of plastic housings. Intended for industrial and professional customers.

name: 3M Double-sided Tape with PVC Carrier 9087, White, 50 mm x 50 m, 0.26 mm
categoryEnglishName: Thin double-sided tapes with film carrier
subCategoryEnglishNames: Thin double-sided tapes with film carrier
description: 3M double-sided tape with PVC film carrier (9087) offers very good adhesion on many high- and low-energy surfaces. The modified acrylic adhesive bonds to metals, paints, plastics (including PE and PP), paper, cardboard and wood. It provides good initial tack and long-term shear strength and dimensional stability. The tape is resistant to moisture, plasticizers and solvents and has very good UV resistance. With its protective liner and film carrier it is well suited for die-cut parts and for applications such as equipping furniture trims, cable channels or sealing profiles, and for mounting, finishing and fixing advertising materials.

name: 3M ATG Adhesive Film 924EU, Transparent, 12 mm x 33 m, 0.05 mm
description: The transparent 3M ATG Adhesive Film 924 from adhesive series 400 provides high bond strength on most substrate surfaces such as metal, paint, most plastics, paper, cardboard, wood or glass. The 0.05 mm thick tape is temperature resistant up to +85 °C (short-term +120 °C), features high initial tack and very good UV resistance. In combination with the 3M ATG 700 hand dispenser it is particularly suitable for fixing, finishing and mounting advertising materials.

name: 3M ATG Adhesive Film 904, Transparent, 19 mm x 44 m, 0.05 mm
description: The 3M 904 adhesive film is carrierless, provides good immediate tack and good shear strength. The 0.05 mm thick adhesive tape is temperature resistant up to +70 °C (short-term +90 °C). Designed for industrial/professional use; suitable for mounting photos, posters and bonding films.

name: 3M Removable Double-sided Tape 4658F, Transparent, 12 mm x 25 m, 0.8 mm
description: The 3M Removable Foam Tape is a transparent, double-sided mounting tape that can be removed and repositioned as needed. It is highly UV- and weather-resistant and is suitable for secure, invisible fixation of various materials such as glass, wood, concrete, ceramic or plastic, replacing screws and nails. Suitable for indoor and outdoor use; holds up to 25 kg/m. Color: transparent.

The tapes equipped with an acrylate (acrylic) adhesive can be removed in one piece by a quick pull, leaving previously bonded surfaces undamaged. Ideal for short-term use in trade fair and shopfitting, signage, displays and advertising materials.

DT8 offers high initial tack and conformability, suitable for contoured surfaces and bonding to plastics, glass and sealed concrete. Available in black and silver. Intended for industrial / professional customers.

name: 3M ATG Adhesive Film 924EU, Transparent, 19 mm x 33 m, 0.05 mm
description: The transparent 3M ATG Adhesive Film 924 (series 400) provides high immediate tack on most substrates such as metal, paint, many plastics, paper, cardboard, wood or glass. name: 3M All-Purpose Tape DT8, Black, 48 mm x 55 m, 0.2 mm
description: This aggressive tape consists of a polyethylene film laminated to cloth with a synthetic/natural rubber adhesive blend. It resists curling and tears cleanly from the roll for demanding applications. Designed to provide a versatile, conformable, and quick-bonding solution, the 3M All-Purpose Tape DT8 combines high initial tack with strong conformability, making it suitable for contoured surfaces. Available in silver and black, it sticks well to a range of substrates including plastic, glass and sealed concrete.

name: 3M Double-sided adhesive tape with paper fleece carrier 9086, White, 9 mm x 50 m, 0.19 mm
categoryEnglishName: Thin double-sided adhesive tapes with paper carrier
subCategoryEnglishNames: Thin double-sided adhesive tapes with paper carrier
description: The 3M double-sided adhesive tape with paper fleece carrier 9086 is a universal adhesive tape that bonds to many different substrates, including metal, plastics, paper, cardboard, wood and painted surfaces. Possible application areas include self-adhesive fitting of skirtings, cable ducts or sealing profiles as well as mounting, finishing and fixing of advertising materials such as displays, samples or posters. The tape features very high initial tack and shear strength and also offers good plasticizer and UV resistance. Its color-coded release paper makes tape identification easier. The release liner is white paper with a black 3M logo. Tape color: white. This product is designed, produced, labeled and packaged for sale to industrial and professional customers for workplace use and is not intended for sale to or use by consumers.

name: 3M Aluminium Glass Cloth Tape, 363, Silver, 50 mm x 33 m
description: Scotch adhesive tape 363 is a glass-cloth based tape laminated with aluminium foil providing excellent reflection of radiant heat and outstanding tear resistance due to the glass cloth carrier. The product offers long-term reliable performance in extreme temperature applications; the combination of glass cloth and aluminium enables good formability while maintaining very high tear strength. Suitable for applications in high-temperature areas and on uneven surfaces, shielding and bundling of cable harnesses and more. This product is intended for sale to industrial and professional customers for workplace use and is not intended for sale to or use by consumers. Manufacturer contact: 3M Deutschland GmbH, Carl-Schurz-Str. 1, 41453 Neuss, Germany. E-mail: Innovation.de@3M.com.
material: Glass cloth laminated with aluminium foil

description: Scotch tape 369 is described as a standard packaging adhesive tape. The backing material is a biaxially oriented polypropylene film coated with a synthetic rubber adhesive (solvent-free) that provides good shear strength, initial tack and holds on cartonboard and test linerboard. (Note: product page refers to glass-fabric/aluminium construction for this 363 product.)
